summary: HomePage hero section was updated to use a CSS background image pointing at "/assets/download.webp" with a gradient overlay for readability, but the actual static asset "download.webp" was not added anywhere in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image file "download.webp" to the frontend static assets so it can be referenced by URL at runtime (e.g., place it under the public assets path) without going through the backend.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, so there is no evidence that "download.webp" was committed into a public/static assets directory. HomePage references "/assets/download.webp", but the asset itself is not present in the changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata in project_state.json unrelated to the requested UI change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to add a static image asset and set it as the Home hero background; it does not request changes to project tracking/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend-file-summaries.txt content summarizing many unrelated pages/styles.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request maintaining or changing repository summary files; additionally, the summary mentions unrelated changes not evidenced elsewhere in the provided diff list.
